name: Traditional Mango Pickle (Aam Ka Achar)
description: Made from handpicked raw mangoes with traditional spices passed down through generations. Our Aam Ka Achar brings authentic taste of North Indian kitchens.
ingredients: Raw Mango, Mustard Oil, Red Chili Powder, Turmeric, Fenugreek, Fennel Seeds, Nigella Seeds, Salt
nutritionalInfo: Per 100g: Energy 150 kcal, Fat 8g, Carbohydrates 12g, Protein 2g, Sodium 450mg

name: Spicy Lemon Pickle (Nimbu Ka Achar)
description: Tangy and spicy lemon pickle made with fresh lemons, aged to perfection. Perfect accompaniment for dal-chawal and parathas.
ingredients: Lemon, Mustard Oil, Red Chili Powder, Turmeric, Fenugreek Seeds, Salt, Hing (Asafoetida)
nutritionalInfo: Per 100g: Energy 120 kcal, Fat 6g, Carbohydrates 14g, Protein 1.5g, Vitamin C 35mg

name: Lehsun Ka Achar (Garlic Pickle)
description: Aromatic garlic cloves pickled in pure mustard oil with traditional spices. A must-have for garlic lovers!
ingredients: Garlic, Mustard Oil, Red Chili Powder, Turmeric, Fenugreek, Cumin, Salt
nutritionalInfo: Per 100g: Energy 180 kcal, Fat 10g, Carbohydrates 16g, Protein 3g

name: Mixed Vegetable Pickle
description: A delightful mix of carrots, cauliflower, green chilies, and turnips pickled with aromatic spices.

nutritionalInfo: Per 100g: Energy 140 kcal, Fat 7g, Carbohydrates 15g, Fiber 3g

name: Hari Mirch Ka Achar (Green Chili Pickle)
description: Fiery green chili pickle for those who love extra heat in their meals. Made with fresh green chilies.
ingredients: Green Chili, Mustard Oil, Fenugreek Seeds, Fennel, Salt, Turmeric
nutritionalInfo: Per 100g: Energy 110 kcal, Fat 5g, Carbohydrates 12g, Capsaicin high

name: Classic Plain Papad
